medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting after being transferred to Radius. He had a history of seizure disorders and presented at the Emergency Department with behavioral changes after starting Keppra. The abdominal pain was described as mostly epigastric.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV, CNS lymphoma with residual left-sided deficits, seizure disorder currently being treated with Keppra and Depakote, corneal ulceration s/p enucleation.
